prompt_base: handsome young man, intense determined blue eyes, medium-length, layered, spiky lavender hair, rugged facial features, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin texture, individual hair strands, detailed fabric texture on denim jacket, rugged leather texture on sword strap, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, low quality, blurry, baby face, too young, cute, airbrushed skin
